title: ConventionalCommitMessageNoFooterRequiredExpandedTypes
description: Schema for a conventional Git commit message with emoji, all fields required except footer. Bullet points should appear with a dash in the final text.

emoji.description: An emoji representing the type of change (e.g., ‚ú® for feat, üêõ for fix).

type.description: The type of change based on conventional commits.

scope.description: The component or scope affected (e.g., parser, api, auth).

subject.description: A brief, imperative, present tense summary of the change (max 50 chars recommended but not enforced by schema).

body.description: The commit message body, providing more detail.

summary.description: An extended summary in the body.

bulletPoints.description: Bullet points detailing changes. Each string item corresponds to a line that should be prefixed with a dash in the final text output.
